arts.ttl: 'Didn't touch the ball': Arne Slot says he thought one Liverpool player got 'bored' vs Southampton last night
Fulham trio to star against Saints - FPL tips & team of week
arts.sum: There's not one, but two triple-ups this gameweek as Thomas Woods goes all in on Chelsea and Fulham in his Fantasy Premier League team of the week.

arts.ttl: 'You cannot expect' - Arne Slot makes Federico Chiesa admission after Liverpool return
arts.sum: Federico Chiesa played 45 minutes of Liverpool's 2-1 Carabao Cup quarter-final win over Southampton

arts.ttl: Southampton 1-2 Liverpool: Player ratings as Reds survive Saints scare in Carabao Cup
arts.sum: Darwin Nunez took advantage of uncertainty in the Southampton backline to slot Liverpool in front after 24 minutes, with Harvey Elliott's effort doubling their lead eight minutes later following a slick move. Southampton pushed frantically for an equaliser and had some promising moments in the closing stages, with Jarell Quansah fortunate not to be sent off in second-half stoppage time as Liverpool narrowly held on to their lead.

arts.ttl: Botman, Udogie, Mazraoui: The early FPL Gameweek 17 team news

arts.sum: Arne Slot saw four youngsters feature as Liverpool defeated Southampton 2-1 in the Carabao Cup quarter-finals at St Mary's with some big names remaining on Merseyside

arts.ttl: Southampton 1-2 Liverpool PLAYER RATINGS: Which Reds star was brilliant in an unfamiliar position? Who showed encouraging signs? And which midfielder was a force all evening?
arts.sum: SOUTHAMPTON 1-2 LIVERPOOL - AADAM PATEL ST MARY'S: They did fight back in the second half, and Cameron Archer's stunning finish helped to ensure a nervy finish.
